General.Name: Xiamen Comfort Science&Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiamen Comfort Science&Technology Group Co., Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells health massage appliances in China and internationally. The company offers massage chairs and appliances; fresh air systems and air purifiers; weight analysis scales; and other products. It offers its products under the BRI, medisana, SHUSIJIA, ETRO, joypal, EASEWELL, FUJIMEDIC, ihoco, FUJI, cozzia, and OGAWA brands. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Xiamen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Wu Ling  Li
1.Title: Non-Independent Vice Chairman of Directors & Deputy GM
